newsitem.title: USA: Definition, Media Concepts plan to swap assets.
newsitem.headline: Definition, Media Concepts plan to swap assets.

text.p: Definition Ltd said Tuesday Media Concepts Inc has signed a letter of intent to sell its films and productions distribution license in exchange for 100 percent of Definition's stock.
The letter of intent binds the parties to negotiate a final agreement for the exchange of assets, Definition said.
The value of the proposed deal was not disclosed.
Media Concepts produces video cassettes and television specials and converts educational materials into home study aids.
Definition manages WINQ-TV in West Palm Beach, Fla., and develops infomercials, sells television advertising time, does Internet business and commerce, and prepares, edits and sells film footage.
